Antonio "Tony" Dixon bụ onye America na-ede egwu, onye na-agụ egwu na onye na-emepụta ihe ndekọ, nke a makwaara n'ihe banyere ọrụ ya na ndị na-emepụta ihe abụọ The Underdogs na Eric Dawkins n'okpuru mmepụta moniker The Pentagon
Dixon bidoro ọrụ ide egwu na mmepụta ya dị ka onye otu na mmepụta duo The Underdogs

na Damon Thomas na nchịkọta sara mbara, nke gụnyere Tank, Eric Dawkins na Steve Russell, o mepụtara ọtụtụ egwu, gụnyere Omarion's "O" (2004), "Naked" (2005), na Monica's "Sideline Ho" (2007), na-eje ozi dị ka onye na-egwu egwu na onye nhazi na egwu.

Na njédébé afọ 2000, Dixon na Dawkins guzobere ndị otu mmepụta The Pentagon Ọpụpụ site na ụda R&B nke ọrụ ya gara aga, ha abụọ na ụfọdụ ndị na-ese ihe na ụda, ọkachasị na ụdị pop na ozioma, gụnyere Kristinia DeBarge na Justin Bieber. N'ịgbaso mmekorita ha na abọm Babyface nke afọ 2005 Grown & Sexy tinyere The Underdogs, Babyface gwara Dixon ka ya na ya rụọ ọrụ na abọm 4 nke Beyonce nke afọ 2011 nke ha mepụtara otu "Best Thing I Never Had".
N'afọ 2018, Dixon mepụtara na Toni Braxton nke itoolu
Egwu ya bụ "Long as I Live", nke Dixon mepụtara, ghọrọ asatọ ya na Billboard Adult R&B Songs ma nweta nhọpụta abụọ maka Best R&B Performance na Best R&B Song na 61st Annual Grammy Awards.
